author: Jessica Gonzalez
description: Your choice of honey will greatly influence this drink which harnesses the character of aquavit to great effect with white wine and citrusy notes.
name: Great Northern
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
